FAQ

What is the "Order of New Babylon" community?

The "Order of New Babylon" community is a group of individuals who are interested in learning about AI, monetizing their skills, and building new ecosystems together. The community's focus is on AI implementation in different businesses and using freelance platforms to do that, and maybe creating own agencies.

Revolutionizing the Future

I started using Babylon because it helps me work remotely from Bali. I am Musician and guys from the company explained me how to create video with AI. I can try singing my songs with celebrities voices due to AI opportinities. It creates everithing from the scratch: video raws, voices action around. It even gave me opportunity to right the scrypt of the video. So i am satisfied with community support and AIs. They learned me how to use it from the beginig and how implement into my business. Now I understand that my Feat with Rihana can be perfect. I send my song to her and even recived the answer!
